cast.overview: As bass guitarist for a garage-rock band, Scott Pilgrim has never had trouble getting a girlfriend; usually, the problem is getting rid of them. But when Ramona Flowers skates into his heart, he finds she has the most troublesome baggage of all: an army of ex-boyfriends who will stop at nothing to eliminate him from her list of suitors.
cast.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World

crew.overview: As bass guitarist for a garage-rock band, Scott Pilgrim has never had trouble getting a girlfriend; usually, the problem is getting rid of them. But when Ramona Flowers skates into his heart, he finds she has the most troublesome baggage of all: an army of ex-boyfriends who will stop at nothing to eliminate him from her list of suitors.
crew.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World

details.biography: Bryan Lee O'Malley (born: February 21, 1979) is a Canadian cartoonist, best known for the Scott Pilgrim series.
details.name: Bryan Lee O'Malley
